meanings: (사물에) stand[be] in the way(of), become a drag(on), become a bar(to), be restrained[prevented, hindered] by, (마음에) weigh on one's mind, lie at one's heart, get on one's nerves

examples.korean: She had no inhibitions about making her opinions known. 발음듣기 그녀는 거리낌없이 자기 의견을 드러내었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had no inhibitions about making her opinions known. 발음

examples.korean: He had been working very hard so he had no qualms about taking a few days off. 발음듣기 그는 아주 열심히 일을 해 왔었으므로 며칠 쉬는 데 대해서는 아무 거리낌이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had been working very hard so he had no qualms about taking a few days off. 발음

examples.korean: I freely admit that I made a mistake. 발음듣기 나는 거리낌없이 내가 실수했음을 인정한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I freely admit that I made a mistake. 발음

examples.korean: She has no compunctions about rejecting the plan. 발음듣기 그녀는 그 계획을 거부하는 데 대해 아무런 거리낌이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has no compunctions about rejecting the plan. 발음

examples.korean: They support the measures without reservation. 발음듣기 그들은 그 조치를 아무 거리낌 없이[전혀 주저하지 않고] 지지한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They support the measures without reservation. 발음
